BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: CONNECTICUT ALLIANCE FOR LONG TERM CARE

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO SERVE THE CHARITABLE PURPOSES OF THE ORGANIZATION'S SUPPORTED MEMBER ORGANIZATIONS, ALL OF WHICH ARE PRE-ACUTE AND/OR SUB-ACUTE/POST-ACUTE HEALTH CARE PROVIDERS. ALL SUPPORTED ORGANIZATIONS ARE 501(C)(3) CHARITABLE ORGANIZATIONS.
IRS990.MissionDesc: CALTC OPERATES TO SERVE THE CHARITABLE PURPOSES OF ITS SUPPORTED MEMBER ORGANIZATIONS, ALL OF WHICH ARE PRE-ACUTE AND/OR SUB-ACUTE/POST-ACUTE HEALTH CARE PROVIDERS. ALL OF CALTC'S SUPPORTED ORGANIZATIONS ARE 501(C)(3) CHARITABLE ORGANIZATIONS. CALTC'S CHARITABLE PURPOSES INCLUDE: (1) DEVELOPING, FORMING, AND ADMINISTERING A PROVIDER BASED NETWORK OF MEMBERS TO PROVIDE COST-EFFECTIVE HEALTH CARE SERVICES; (2) INTEGRATING AND CONSOLIDATING CERTAIN NON-PATIENT CARE FUNCTIONS UNDERTAKEN BY MEMBERS; (3) ACQUIRING ITEMS, SERVICES, AND/OR EXPERTISE REQUIRED BY ONE OR MORE MEMBERS; AND (4) MAKING AVAILABLE TO THE MEMBERS THE EXPERTISE OF THE ORGANIZATION THROUGH THE SALE OF MANAGEMENT, DEVELOPMENT AND CONSULTING SERVICES.
IRS990.Desc: SECURE AND MAINTAIN MANAGED CARE PRODUCTS AND SERVICES ON BEHALF OF MEMBER ORGANIZATIONS (ALL INTERNAL REVENUE CODE SECTION 501(C)(3) ORGANIZATIONS).

SupportedOrganizationName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: JEWISH HOME FOR THE ELDERLY OF FAIRFIELD COUNTY

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 6
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION HAS MEMBERS, AND EACH MEMBER HAS BOARD REPRESENTATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD APPOINTS NEW MEMBERS ON AN ANNUAL BASIS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 8B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THERE ARE NO COMMITTEES WITH AUTHORITY TO ACT ON BEHALF OF THE BOARD.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FORM 990 IS PROVIDED TO ALL MEMBERS OF THE BOARD FOR REVIEW BEFORE FILING WITH THE IRS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES THESE DOCUMENTS AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.
